channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Sam Fender Wins 2025 Mercury Prize For People Watching
item.description: 🏆🎉 Sam Fender takes home the Mercury Prize for his stellar album 'People Watching'! Time to celebrate! 🎶🥳 #SamFender #MercuryPrize

item.title: Girl Scout announce debut LP ‘Brink,’ share “Same Kids”
item.description: 🍪✨ Get ready to jam with @GirlScoutOfficial's debut album 'Brink'! 🎶 Listen to their latest single "Same Kids" now! #NewMusic #GirlScoutBrink

item.title: SZA Joins Old Friend, New Jersey Rapper MoRuf on Nostalgic Single ‘PT Cruiser’
item.description: SZA and MoRuf team up for a ride down memory lane! 🚗🎶 #PTCruiser #CollabGoals

item.title: The Cure Are 13 Songs Into A New Album
item.description: 🎶 The Cure cooking up a new album with 13 tunes brewing! Who's ready for some new jams? 🎸 #TheCure #NewMusicAlert

item.title: The Last Dinner Party Map Out 2026 North American Tour
item.description: 🌟 Let's feast on some live music vibes! The Last Dinner Party hitting the road in 2026 🎶🚗 Who's joining the party? 🎉 #TheLastDinnerPartyTour
